lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio, whose caravan was caught speeding by a local news crew, is only the latest in a long line of New York officials who have been caught flat-footed by a transportation faux pas.
snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio, whose caravan was caught speeding by a local news crew, is only the latest in a long line of New York officials who have been caught flat-footed by a transportation faux pas....
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's chauffeured sports utility vehicle is caught by television news crew breaking several traffic rules, including speeding, attracting widespread attention on television and social media; episode rattles de Blasio, who has unveiled sweeping street safety campaign with goal of eliminating traffic deaths in city.

headline.main: Lesson for de Blasio as His S.U.V. Breaks Rules of the Road
headline.print_headline: A Lesson for de Blasio as His S.U.V. Violates Some Rules of the Road
